The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area swarming with feeding Tyrannosaursu and biting Tasmanian Tigers. They group tries to make their way back to safety only to run into kidnappers looking to sell the survivors on the black market.
